def_cn: (基督教正式追封的)圣徒，圣人
def_en: A saint is someone who has died and been officially recognized and honoured by the Christian church because his or her life was a perfect example of the way Christians should live.

def_cn: 至善的人;极有耐心的人;道德高尚的人;圣人般的人
def_en: If you refer to a living person as a saint, you mean that they are extremely kind, patient, and unselfish.
